message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, considering the inflation
The inflation is hitting me harder, Bob.  I need a bigger share to make it worthwhile.
Inflation is affecting me too, but I think I can take a bit more, considering your last offer
This is my final offer, Bob.  The inflation is eating away at any potential gains.  Let's close this deal.
